page.title: 08Housing In Bury Village
page.content: At Yelcon homes estate at Upwood Road Bury they employ a total of 21 people ranging from a site agent to a bricklayer.All the builders are self employed.Most of them live outside a 10 mile radius.They decided to build on the site because of cheaper land prices.There are 87 houses on the site ranging from Â£15700 to Â£90000.On average they build 3 houses a month.At the moment there are 60 houses occupied.They have still got to finish off 25 houses.All together they build 11 types of houses. At the moment they have been on the site about 3 years. All kinds of people buy these houses ranging from people just setting home to wealthy executives.There are also sites at Warboys,Yaxley and Sawtry.
